Core.Line: What is the meaning of 'out of service'?
It's ... a disaster. This bridge is the only way to the mountain.
The unexpected appearance surprises Island, but Bookworm and Card seem calm.
I can, but I'm afraid I won't.
You are not ready. Not ready to make decisions.
So you are telling me to stay out and wait for who-know-how-long-it-is?
Please try reasoning. I'm sure she wishes you all good.
Is it feasible that I start preparing for whatever you say after getting across the bridge? I ... want to finish this whole business as soon as possible.
You need to challenge me. Win my game before I fix your bridge.
In this game, your friends need to participate too.
